fields.description:
{html}

Platform 1.3.0 OS: MacOSX/WinXP iPhone emulator 3.1.3, android emulator 2.1

I have window and scrollview inside it. scrollview also have children (labels and views). I'm trying to attach click or dblclick handler on scrollview. Both handlers work on Android but not on iPhone. All children views can receive click events on both target platforms (Android/iPhone). It seems it's only related to scrollview on iPhone

{html}
fields.summary: click events don't work on scrollview on iPhone
